slides.script: I forgot my best friend's birthday...for the 3rd year in a row. My mind was so foggy, I could barely remember what I ate for breakfast. Sound familiar?
slides.image_prompt: ultra photorealistic image of a stressed woman with her head in her hands sitting at a kitchen table, soft morning light filtering in, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Turns out, I wasn't alone. My sister, my co-worker, even my gym buddy were all struggling with the same thing - constant stress and brain fog. It was like an epidemic no one was talking about.
slides.image_prompt: ultra photorealistic image of three women of different ages and ethnicities looking exhausted and stressed in different settings - office, gym, cafe. 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: What doctors don't tell you? Chronic stress can literally shrink your brain. While I was struggling to focus at work, this hidden stress was silently sabotaging me.
slides.image_prompt: ultra photorealistic close-up side view of a woman's head with a glowing, stressed brain visible, 16k, dramatic lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Then one day, my yoga instructor pulled me aside after class. She'd been through the same thing and swore by an ancient adaptogen called ashwagandha. I was skeptical, but the science backed her up.
slides.image_prompt: ultra photorealistic image of a serene yoga instructor having a sincere conversation with a stressed woman in a sun-drenched yoga studio, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Turns out, ashwagandha has been used for over 3,000 years in Ayurvedic medicine. Studies show it can reduce cortisol (the stress hormone) by up to 30%. Even doctors are recommending it now.
slides.image_prompt: ultra photorealistic image of an ancient Ayurvedic medicine book open to a page on ashwagandha with modern research papers and a doctor's stethoscope next to it, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Day 3: I noticed I wasn't snapping at my kids as much. Day 7: I actually remembered to pick up the dry cleaning without writing it down. Week 2: My brain fog lifted and I was crushing it at work.
slides.image_prompt: ultra photorealistic image sequence showing a woman looking progressively happier and more energetic - playing with kids, checking off to-do list, giving a confident presentation, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Even my skeptical husband noticed the difference. "You're like a new person," he said. My mom started asking what my secret was. She couldn't believe the change in just a few weeks.
slides.image_prompt: ultra photorealistic image of a surprised husband and an impressed older mother looking at a radiant, smiling woman, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Now, I have the energy to be the mom, wife, and employee I always wanted to be. No more forgetting birthdays or losing my cool over little things. I feel like I've gotten my life back.
slides.image_prompt: ultra photorealistic image of a happy, energetic woman playfully hugging her kids and husband in a bright, airy living room, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: The secret? Goli Ashwagandha Gummies. Organic, plant-based, and doctor-approved. Just two gummies a day gave me my calm and clarity back.
slides.image_prompt: ultra photorealistic image of a woman's hand holding a bottle of Goli Ashwagandha Gummies with a soft focus doctor in a white coat in the background giving an approving nod, 16k, natural lighting, HDR, high resolution, shot on Canon EOS R5, Canon RF 50mm f/1.2L USM, depth of field, --s 750, 9:16 vertical format

slides.script: Don't wait until stress steals more memories. Try Goli Ashwagandha Gummies for yourself and feel the difference in just days. Your future self will thank you.
